external_references.description: An, J and Malhotra, A. (2021, November 10). North Korean attackers use malicious blogs to deliver malware to high-profile South Korean targets. Retrieved December 29, 2021.

description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has used a file injector DLL to spawn a benign process on the victim's system and inject the malicious payload into it via process hollowing.(Citation: Talos Kimsuky Nov 2021)
